com.danielly.jsf.cinema.dao

Class ShowtimeSeatsDaoImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.danielly.jsf.cinema.dao.ShowtimeSeatsDaoImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ShowtimeSeatsDao

    @ApplicationScoped
public class ShowtimeSeatsDaoImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ShowtimeSeatsDao
    The class ShowtimeSeatsDaoImpl contains all the methods implementation to query the showtimes_seats table. It contains the basic CRUD methods and additional methods that were needed. This class implements the ShowtimeSeatsDao interface
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Gil Danielly
